title: Laptop - Wikipedia
paragraphs: A laptop computer or notebook computer, also known as a laptop or notebook, is a small, portable personal computer (PC). Laptops typically have a clamshell form factor with a flat-panel screen on the inside of the upper lid and an alphanumeric keyboard and pointing device on the inside of the lower

Laptops are used in a variety of settings, such as at work (especially on business trips), in education, for playing games, content creating, web browsing, for personal multimedia, and for general home computer use. They can run on both AC power and built-in rechargable batteries, and can be folded

Design elements, form factors, and construction can also vary significantly between models depending on the intended use. Examples of specialized models of laptops include 2-in-1 laptops, with keyboards that either be detached or pivoted out of view from the display (often marketed having a "laptop

The history of the laptop follows closely behind the development of the personal computer itself. A "personal, portable information manipulator" was imagined by Alan Kay at Xerox PARC in 1968,[5] and described in his 1972 paper as the "Dynabook".[6] The IBM Special Computer APL Machine Portable (SCA

As 8-bit CPU machines became widely accepted, the number of portables increased rapidly. The first "laptop-sized notebook computer" was the Epson HX-20,[10][11] invented (patented) by Suwa Seikosha's Yukio Yokozawa in July 1980,[12] introduced at the COMDEX computer show in Las Vegas by Japanese com

paragraphs: When it comes to purchasing a new laptop, one of the first things consumers consider is the brand. There are many well-known laptop brands on the market, each with its own unique features and reputation. In this article, we will take a look at some of the top laptop brands without actually mentionin

One factor to consider when choosing a laptop brand is the quality of its products. Some brands are known for their durability and long-lasting devices, while others may have a reputation for lower quality or are prone to technical issues. It is important to research and read reviews before making a

Another factor to consider is the brand’s range of products. Some brands offer a wide variety of laptop models and options, catering to a range of needs and budgets. Others may have a more limited selection but may specialize in a particular type of devices such as gaming laptops or 2-in-1 convertib

In addition to quality and range of products, customer support is also an important factor to consider when choosing a laptop brand. Some brands are known for their excellent customer service, with helpful and knowledgeable support staff available to assist with any issues or questions. Others may n

Overall, it is important to do your research and consider all of these factors when choosing a laptop brand. Whether you are a student, gamer, or professional, there is a brand out there that can meet your needs and preferences.
